Package org.j2free.email

Interface Summary
EmailService.ErrorPolicy Policy for when a send fails
 

Class Summary
EmailService A service for sending e-mails that provides support for session properties, including authorization, templating, and priority queuing.
SimpleEmailService Static wrapper around a single EmailService
SimpleEmailService.DiscardPolicy Implements EmailService.ErrorPolicy to discard failed messages writing only a message to the log.
SimpleEmailService.RequeuePolicy Implements EmailService.ErrorPolicy to requeue the message at the specified Priority.
Template A wrapper for holding a template and it's corresponding content-type.
 

Enum Summary
EmailService.ContentType  
 

Exception Summary
TemplateException
